resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

couponType.name: couponType
couponType.description: Either product (valid for specified products or subscription plans) or checkout (valid for any checkout)
couponType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

productIds.name: productIds
productIds.description: Comma-separated list of product IDs. Required if coupon_type is product. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.
productIds.ai_hint: Comma-separated list of product IDs. Required if coupon_type is product. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

discountType.name: discountType
discountType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

currency.name: currency
currency.description: The currency must match the balance currency specified in your account
currency.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: state
options.description: Filter: The user subscription status. Returns all active, past_due, trialing and paused subscription plans if not specified.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

updateBy.name: updateBy
updateBy.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

group.name: group
group.description: The name of the group of coupons you want to update
group.ai_hint: The name of the group of coupons you want to update

paymentId.name: paymentId
paymentId.description: The upcoming subscription payment ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
paymentId.ai_hint: The upcoming subscription payment ID. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

date.name: date
date.description: Date you want to move the payment to
date.ai_hint: Date you want to move the payment to

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'coupon' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'couponType'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND couponType == 'product' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'productIds'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'discountType'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND discountType == 'flat' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'discountAmount'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND discountType == 'percentage' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'discountAmount'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND discountType == 'flat' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'currency'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'create' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'productId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'coupon' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'coupon' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'update' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'updateBy'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'update' AND updateBy == 'couponCode' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'couponCode'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'update' AND updateBy == 'group' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'group'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'update' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'update' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'coupon' AND operation == 'update' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF discountType == 'flat' THEN SHOW parameter 'currency'
IF discountType == 'flat' THEN SHOW parameter 'discountAmount'
IF discountType == 'percentage' THEN SHOW parameter 'discountAmount'
IF resource == 'payment' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'payment' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'payment' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'getAll' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'getAll' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'reschedule' THEN SHOW parameter 'paymentId'
IF resource == 'payment' AND operation == 'reschedule' THEN SHOW parameter 'date'
IF resource == 'plan' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'plan' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'planId'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'plan' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'plan' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'product' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'product' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getAll' AND resource == 'product' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' THEN SHOW parameter 'jsonParameters'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND jsonParameters == True THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFieldsJson'
IF resource == 'user' AND operation == 'getAll' AND jsonParameters == False THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
